screen_desc: The screenshot shows the eBay mobile website with a search conducted for "macbook pro 15 inch." It presents a list of MacBook Pro laptops available for sale, with options to save the search, and to sort or filter the results. Two listings are visible: one for an Apple MacBook Pro 15 inch with a retina display, Quad-Core i7, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD, marked as pre-owned and offered at a discounted price with an additional coupon. The other listing is for an Apple MacBook Pro 15" with 1TB SSD and a Quad-Core i7 3.30GHz, also pre-owned, with a different discounted price. There is an indication that over 4,200 results are available.
